sentences.english: It has sustained them for generations, providing everything they need to survive.
sentences.chinese: 祂世世代代养活着他们，赐予他们生存所必须的一切。

sentences.english: The Pariahs were a specific caste whose hereditary job it was to act as the drummer in those festivals.
sentences.chinese: 帕利亚阶层的人世世代代都在那些节日里担任鼓手。

sentences.english: Instead, this is life after life already doomed. Please believe this reality.
sentences.chinese: 而是，这是生生世世早已经注定的。

sentences.english: A lie ages of bullying through the multitudinous mind three words.
sentences.chinese: 一句谎世世欺三句言透沵心。

sentences.english: We are leaving a perpetual gift to generations of children to come.
sentences.chinese: 我们会为未来世世代代的儿童留下一份永久的礼物。

sentences.english: Standing on the helpless bridge, see you shengshengshishi samsara.
sentences.chinese: 站在奈何桥，看迩生生世世轮回。

sentences.english: It was to be a place never forgotten in Israel's future.
sentences.chinese: 这是为要使以色列民世世不忘。

sentences.english: Chinese fishing boats in nansha islands vie throughout your generations of waters homework.
sentences.chinese: 中国渔船世世代代在南沙群岛万安滩海域作业。

sentences.english: What’s kept them prideful and strong all these generations?
sentences.chinese: 他们凭什么世世代代保持了自己的尊严和兴旺呢？

sentences.english: By so doing, generations of Hui merchants have ceaselessly directed wealth into their home villages.
sentences.chinese: 世世代代的徽商就是这样让财富源源不断流向故乡的。

sentences.english: Celebrate this day as a lasting ordinance for the generations to come.
sentences.chinese: 所以，你们要守这日，作为世世代代永远的定例。

sentences.english: This hate is seeded in alaya consciousness and the karmic creditors will follow you in all your lives.
sentences.chinese: 这种怨恨在阿赖耶里面就变成种子，生生世世跟着你。

sentences.english: Wherefore the children of Israel shall keep the sabbath， to observe the sabbath throughout their generations， for a perpetual covenant.
sentences.chinese: 故此，以色列人要世世代代守安息日为永远的约。

sentences.english: It is their right for ever from generation to generation.
sentences.chinese: 这是他们世世代代永得的分。

sentences.english: This is to be a lasting ordinance among the Israelites for the generations to come.
sentences.chinese: 这要作以色列人世世代代永远的定例。

sentences.english: And that was counted unto him for righteousness unto all generations for evermore.
sentences.chinese: 那就算为他的义，世世代代，直到永远。

definition: to die/future incarnation/next life/to be born/to come into the world/future generation
from generation to generation/generation after generation
a whole lifetime (idiom); all my life
